de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.listener

Interface OnRenderStateListener


  • public interface OnRenderStateListener
    All methods have an empty default body so that implementations don't need to provide all unused methods as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean closed(MenuRenderer render, IMenu menu, org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
      called by a render, when a player closed the menu.
      default void opened(MenuRenderer render, IMenu menu, org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
      called by a render, when the open method was called
      default void paused(MenuRenderer render, IMenu menu)
      called by the render manager once all viewers closed the render.
      default void resumed(MenuRenderer render, IMenu menu)
      called by the render if menu was opened and there's now one viewer meaning this is the first viewer on the menu.
      The menu will be registered in the render manager for animation.
      default boolean tick(int ms, MenuRenderer render, IMenu menu)
      called after all elements in the rendered menu were ticked.

    • Method Detail

      • opened

        default void opened(MenuRenderer render,
                    IMenu menu,
                    org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
        called by a render, when the open method was called

      • closed

        default boolean closed(MenuRenderer render,
                       IMenu menu,
                       org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
        called by a render, when a player closed the menu. # this could be due to actually closing it or delayed in case another menu opened over this menu (will prevent the event from being received)
        Returns:
        true if you're scheduling to open any other gui to prevent a eventual parent menu to interfere with you

      • paused

        default void paused(MenuRenderer render,
                    IMenu menu)
        called by the render manager once all viewers closed the render. if no other plugin hold on the render it should now be GCable.

      • resumed

        default void resumed(MenuRenderer render,
                     IMenu menu)
        called by the render if menu was opened and there's now one viewer meaning this is the first viewer on the menu.
        The menu will be registered in the render manager for animation.

      • tick

        default boolean tick(int ms,
                     MenuRenderer render,
                     IMenu menu)
        called after all elements in the rendered menu were ticked.
        Returns:
        true if you changed elements on the menu
